entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
